scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && python3.12 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -q -r requirements.txt && python3.12 wait_for_db.py && uvicorn app.main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others --names "DB,FRONTEND,BACKEND" -c "green,cyan,magenta" "npm run dev:db" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend"
scripts.install:backend: cd backend && python3.12 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
